| History                 = Green Spring was a company run by the [[Emil Blonsky (Earth-616)|Abomination]] whose goal was to weaponize gamma mutation by experimenting on people. Blonsky often used pieces of his own flesh in Green Spring's experiments. When one of its test subjects named [[Dionne Fortean (Earth-616)|Dionne]] escaped, [[Skaar (Earth-616)|Skaar]], who was repowered by Green Spring, was sent to retrieve Dionne, but ran into interference by [[Gamma Flight (Alpha Flight Space Program) (Earth-616)|Gamma Flight]]. When the [[United States Hulkbuster Force (Earth-616)|United States Hulkbuster Force]] came to break up the fight, Skaar attacked the Hulkbuster Force for fun. Blonsky decided to let Skaar fight the Hulkbuster Force as a show of Green Spring's experimental capabilities.{{r|Gamma Flight Vol 1 1|2}}
